pm.expect(sku.name).to.eql("Natural Radiant Longwear Full Coverage Foundation");

pm.expect(sku.ingredientDesc).to.eql("Diméthicone, eau, triméthicone de phényl, glycérine, polyméthylsilsséquioxane, PEG-10 diméthicone, diméthicone Crospolymer diméthicone, cyclopentasiloxane, triméthylsiloxysilicate, PGP-3 Benzyl éther Myrisstate, Boron Nitride, BIS-butyldiméthicone polyglycérol-3, butylène glycol, sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, extrait de fruit de Rubus Idaeus (framboise), extrait de fruit de Citrullus Lanatus (melon d'eau), extrait de fruit de pyrus Malus (pomme), extrait de fruit d'esculenta (lentilles), tocophérol, PCA de sodium, lactate de sodium, glutamate de stade stéaryle de disodium, Polydéène hydrogéné, pentyrityl tétraéthylhexanoate, Peg/PPG-14/7 diméthyl éther, tétratérythrityl-Di-T-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, glutamate stéarobyle de sodium, acide béhénique, acide stéarique, alcool stéarylique, alcool béhényle, distéarmonium-htorite, triéthoxycaprylsilane, sulfate de baryum, diméthyriÉtat d'aluminium, alumine, oxyde d'étain, polysilicone-2, hydroxyde de potassium, phénoxyéthanol, benzoate de sodium, SORBATE de potassium, [+/- (peut contenir) : Mica, dioxyde de titane (ci 77891), oxydes de fer (ci 77491), oxydes de fer (ci 77492), oxydes de fer (ci 77499)].");

graphql.query:
query skus($skuIds: [ID], $locale: StandardLocale) {
  skus(skuIds: $skuIds, locale: $locale) {
    skuId
    state
    size
    color
    scent
    formulation
    concentration
    type
    oosTreatment
    variationDesc
    sephoraType
    biType
    biExclusiveLevel
    name
    ingredientDesc
    fulfiller
    primaryProductId
    parentProducts {
      productId
    }
    upc
    seoFriendlyUrl
    limitedTimeOfferRestrictedCountries
    firstAccessRestrictedCountries
    appExclusiveRestrictedCountries
    restrictedCountryList
    restrictedStates
    restrictedProvinces
    formulationRefinement
    finishRefinement
    sizeRefinement
    colorFamily
    maxPurchaseQuantity
    tempMaxPurchaseQuantity
    tempMaxPurchaseQuantityStartDate
    tempMaxPurchaseQuantityEndDate
    taxCode
    active
    storeOnly
    onHold
    comingSoon
    comingSoonSkuEndDate
    hazmat
    hawaiiHazmatFlag
    biOnly
    biOnlyStartDate
    biOnlyEndDate
    onlineOnly
    onlineOnlyEndDate
    externallySellable
    giftWrappable
    limitedEdition
    new
    newUntilDate
    sephoraExclusive
    firstAccessFlag
    appExclusiveFlag
    trialEligible
    trialPeriod
    configurable
    returnable
    limitedTimeOfferFlag
    prop65
    notSentToWarehouse
    labCode
    fullSizeSkuId
    startDate
    endDate
    tempDeactivationDate
    limitedTimeOfferStartDate
    limitedTimeOfferEndDate
    firstAccessStartDate
    firstAccessEndDate
    appExclusiveStartDate
    appExclusiveEndDate
    primaryImages {
      imageId
      altText
      baseUrl
    }
    alternativeImages {
      imageId
      altText
      baseUrl
    }
    sephoraExclusiveUntilDate
    highlights {
      highlightId
      name
      description
      altText
      imageUrl
      appsImageUrl
    }
    badges {
      badgeId
      altText
      imageUrl
      name
    }
    payPalPayLaterEligible
    temporaryDeactivationReason
    paypalRestricted
    calculateTax
    hideFromSale
    excludeFromSearch
    reservationsEnabled
    fraudRiskLevel
    bestForSkinTypes
    primaryConcern
    classNumber
    departmentNumber
    discountable
    countryOfManufacture
    subclassNumber
    efficacyIngredient
    efficacy
    shopNumber
    biDescription
    productLine
    displaySkuAsProductInSearchResult
    callCenterOnly
    acceleratedReplenishmentPlan {
      replenishmentPlanId
      enabled
      planTier
      promotionId
      promotionOrderCount
      promoDuration
      promoExcludedCountries
    }
    subscriptionCountryList
    replenishmentEnabled
    subscriptionFreqNum
    subscriptionFreqType
    replenishmentPlan {
      replenishmentPlanId
      enabled
      planTier
      promotionId
      promotionOrderCount
      promoDuration
      promoExcludedCountries
    }
    sequence
    valuePrice
    configurableProperty {
      configurablePropertyId
      displayName
      title
      description
      imagePath
      imageCopy: free
      configurationOptions {
        configurationOptionId
        type
        upc
        skuId: productId
        primaryProductId
      }
    }
    sampleType
    rewardType
    rewardSubType
    rewardPoints
    rewardCurrencyAmount
    rewardActive
    nonsellable
    fullSizeProductId
    originalSampleProductId
  }
}

exec: pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.expect(sku.variationDesc).to.eql("M5 - medium to medium-deep with warm undertones, and a peach tone");
pm.expect(sku.name).to.eql("Natural Radiant Longwear Full Coverage Foundation");

pm.expect(sku.ingredientDesc).to.eql("Dimethicone, Water, Phenyl Trimethicone, Glycerin, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cyclopentasiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Boron Nitride, Bis-Butyldimethicone Polyglyceryl-3, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Behenic Acid, Stearic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Barium Sulfate, Aluminum Dimyristate, Alumina, Tin Oxide, Polysilicone-2, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, [+/- (May Contain): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)].");

exec: pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.expect(sku.name).to.eql("Fond de teint éclat naturel longue tenue à couvrance totale");
pm.expect(product.name).to.eql("Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum");

pm.expect(product.shortDescription).to.eql("

What it is: A deeply hydrating serum with juicy plum and 5 weights of hyaluronic acid that fill each skin layer with hydration for visibly plump skin.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles


Formulation: Lightweight Serum

");

pm.expect(product.longDescription).to.eql("

What it is: A deeply hydrating serum with juicy plum and 5 weights of hyaluronic acid that fill each skin layer with hydration for visibly plump skin.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles


Formulation: Lightweight Serum


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Next-Gen Hyaluronic Acid: A powerful blend of multi-weight hyaluronic acids (ultra-low, low, medium, high, and ultra-high molecular weights) that hydrate layers of skin for plump-, bouncy-looking skin.

- Plum: Three antioxidant-rich plums (kakadu, illawarra, and burdekin) hydrate, nourish, and rejuvenate skin‘s appearance quickly and over time while working with hyaluronic acid for intense, juicy hydration.

- Vegan Collagen and Silk Proteins: Potent, plant-based, powerhouse ingredients that support a healthy-looking skin barrier by guarding against free radicals and hydrating skin.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.


What Else You Need to Know: An innovative treatment with plum and 5 molecular weights of next-gen hyaluronic acid that fill each skin layer with hydration for visibly plumper skin. This lightweight serum deeply hydrates dry, dehydrated skin and diminishes the appearance of visible fine lines for healthy, bouncy, youthful skin.


Clinical Results: In a consumer study of 36 subjects, after one day:

- 100% agreed their skin felt hydrated.

- 100% agreed this serum absorbed easily into their skin.

- 94% agreed their skin felt softer and smoother.

- 94% agreed their skin had a healthy, glowing radiance after use.

- 92% agreed their skin felt supple and plump.


Clean & Planet Aware
Our ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

");

pm.expect(product.suggestedUsage).to.eql("Suggested Usage:
-Before applying moisturizer, dispense one to two pumps and gently pat onto slightly damp face and neck until fully absorbed.
-Apply daily in the morning and evening.");
pm.expect(product.quickLookDescription).to.eql("A hydrating serum with juicy plum and five weights of hyaluronic acid that fills skin with hydration for a visibly plump effect.");
pm.expect(product.videos[1].title).to.eql("All About Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Acid Serum by Glow Recipe");
pm.expect(product.videos[1].title).to.eql("All About Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Acid Serum by Glow Recipe");
pm.expect(product.seoMetaDescription).to.eql("Shop Glow Recipe‘s Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Acid Serum at Sephora. This serum hydrates each skin layer for visibly plump skin.");
pm.expect(product.finalTitle).to.eql("Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Acid Serum - Glow Recipe | Sephora");
pm.expect(product.finalMetaDescription).to.eql("Shop Glow Recipe‘s Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Acid Serum at Sephora. This serum hydrates each skin layer for visibly plump skin.");

}

exec:
pm.expect(product.longDescription).to.eql("YVES SAINT LAURENT

Natural Glow (Virtual Experience)

Learn how to get a naturally radiant glow in an online consultation with Paul Garcia, Yves Saint Laurent’s head of education and makeup artistry. You’ll also get all the products needed so you can easily recreate the look at home.

This reward includes:
- One-on-One Makeup Consultation with Paul Garcia, Yves Saint Laurent’s head of education and makeup artistry
- 0.11 oz / 3.2 g Yves Saint Laurent Rouge Volupté Shine Lipstick Balm in 131 Chili Morocco
- 1.0 oz / 30 mL Yves Saint Laurent Touche Éclat Blur Face Primer
- 0.25 oz / 7.5 mL Yves Saint Laurent Mascara Volume Effet Faux Cils Volumizing Mascara
- 0.08 oz / 2.5 mL Yves Saint Laurent Touche Éclat All-Over Brightening Concealer Pen in 2 Luminous Ivory
- 0.08 oz / 2.5 mL Yves Saint Laurent Touche Éclat All-Over Brightening Concealer Pen in 4 Luminous Toffee

*Subject to Beauty Insider Terms & Conditions. Offer valid online for a limited time or while supplies last. Quantities limited to 4. Offer is valid with 7,500 Beauty Insider points at time of redemption. Valid for U.S. residents only. Includes a 45-minute one-on-one virtual consultation with Paul Garcia, Yves Saint Laurent’s Head of Education & Makeup Artistry, and a YSL product assortment. Virtual experience will be scheduled based on client and brand’s availability and must be scheduled between Monday – Saturday, 10:00AM – 6:00PM EST. Redeeming client must be at least 18 years of age and the age of majority in his/her state of primary residence as of the date of the Event. Reward expires on 7/31/21. Offer does not include travel or accommodations. Redeeming client must complete, sign and return to Sephora an affidavit of eligibility and liability/publicity release. Client must communicate with Sephora’s Concierge Service within two weeks for fulfillment or reward may be forfeited. Points will not be refunded in the event of client cancellations and no-shows. This reward is electronically fulfilled, and you will receive redemption instructions via email. Because this reward is electronically fulfilled, this reward does not apply towards shipping threshold for 100 point rewards, 250 point rewards, 500 point rewards, and samples. Certain Rewards require that we share your personal information with the beauty brand associated with the Reward. By redeeming a Reward, you expressly agree that Sephora may share your personal information with the beauty brand. Each brand has agreed that any personal information that it receives from us will be used only to fulfil the terms of the Reward.

");

pm.expect(product.suggestedUsage).to.eql("

My Beauty Bank doesn’t have enough points for this reward. Can I make a purchase and redeem this reward at the same time?

Points earned from a purchase cannot be used in the same transaction to redeem for a reward. Only points from previous purchases can be applied. Please note that adding a reward to your basket does not reserve it for you.

Do I need to make a purchase to redeem this reward?

There is no purchase required for rewards valued 750 points and above. To redeem a reward valued below 750 points, you must make a merchandise purchase. Multiple reward redemptions cannot be combined to reach the 750-point minimum (i.e. a 500-point reward + a 250-point reward). For Sephora Charity Rewards that are 500-point and above, there is no purchase required for redemption.

Do I need to pay for shipping?

All rewards worth 750 points or more ship free, regardless of whether you’ve purchased merchandise. Multiple reward redemptions cannot be combined to reach the 750-point minimum (i.e. a 500-point reward + a 250-point reward). Rewards valued below 750 points ship free with a $50 minimum purchase.

I’m a Sephora FLASH member. Can I opt for expedited shipping on my reward?

Your order is only eligible for FLASH 1-2 Day Shipping with a merchandise purchase. If you redeem a 750-point reward without a merchandise purchase, your order will be shipped via Standard 3-Day Shipping.

Can I add samples or a promotion to my order?

If you purchase merchandise, your order will be eligible for 2 free samples and a promo code. The redemption of a 750-point reward without a merchandise purchase does not qualify for additional samples or promotions.

If I redeem an experiential or personalized reward, how do I book my trip/appointment/etc.?

Leave it to us! Shortly after redeeming your reward, you will receive separate email that outlines next steps. This is in addition to your order confirmation email. Please check your spam and junk folders if not received within 24 hours.

Can I return my reward?

Unfortunately, rewards may not be returned or exchanged for points, cash, another product, gift card, or eGift certificate.

");

pm.expect(product.quickLookDescription).to.eql("

\nLearn how to get a naturally radiant glow in an online consultation with Paul Garcia, Yves Saint Laurent’s head of education and makeup artistry. You’ll also get all the products needed so you can easily recreate the look at home.

");
pm.expect(product.finalTitle).to.eql("Natural Glow (Virtual Experience) - Yves Saint Laurent | Sephora");

exec: pm.expect(product.name).to.eql("Sérum hydratant à lʼacide hyaluronique Plum Plump™");
pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.expect(entitie.name).to.eql("Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum");
pm.test("Response data skus should not be empty", () => {
pm.test("Response service should not be empty", () => {
